body.name: HOME&I Kitchen Utensil Holder-Drying Rack Basket Organizer Utility Sturdy Stainless Steel 304 Flatware Silverware Cutlery Storage for Kitchen Dining (Medium-2 Compartments)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 8 mins
features: Convenient Hanging Type - If you wanted something that would hang on your wire dish drainer for a sponge, it will be perfect for your need. Sturdy hooks are designed to attach easily to most wired dish drainers or shelves. You can make good use of the space.
SUS 304 Sturdy Stainless-Steel -Rustproof and dishwasher safe. It does not rust easily and does not discolor. The holder is easy to wash.It is easy to clean and has a long life span.

Excellent Kitchen Organizer–If you love cooking, but wish there was a better way to organize and store your kitchen utensils, this utensil holder is the perfect solution. With a roomy interior that can comfortably fit up to large spoons, spatulas, ladles, and more at once, our kitchen storage organizer holder is designed to declutter. Perfect for storing brushes and art supplies too!

Convenient use - This sink rack allows you to dry any kitchen utensils, dishes and silverware. With an attractive, stylish design, this stainless-steel dish drainer is a perfect addition to your kitchen. It features a drain hole that is round shaped and evenly distributed around the basket. This will allow efficient drying of utensils. Sturdy hooks are designed to attach easily to most wired dish drainers. Excellent quality and easy to clean.
Customers come first - We stand firmly behind the quality of our kitchenware. If you’re not completely satisfied, contact us and we will make things right. Click the Add to Cart Button Now!
body.description: Organize kitchen utensil clutter with our stylish and durable utensil holder- No matter if you’re cooking or cleaning, this roomy small kitchen utensil holder for countertop storage easily fits and organizes and keeps the kitchen clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds a lot and steady on its feet.
reviews.reviewText: My only gripe is that it was $20, but it is very nice. Many others gave me the impression they would fall over if weight wasn't distributed correctly. This one is steady and comes with a tray to catch the run off. I think it will last too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job.
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy; holds a lot. Easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So much better than the last one
reviews.reviewText: Overall good design and materials. Drains well, but the slots are small so nothing I put in the drainer will fall through (that was the fatal flaw with my previous drainer). It could be larger, but I got 2 which fits nicely in the dish drainer. The only actual design flaw I found is that you need to load both sides (2 compartments) or it will get tipsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for our small plate holders rack
reviews.reviewText: Love this it’s cute and holds a lot and has a piece in the back that can attack to the sink rack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little basket
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this little basket to replace the plastic one I got with my dish drying rack. This little basket works great and my wooden utensils get dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is what I needed! The silverware fell through my other one, which was useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very light and thin.
reviews.reviewText: I thought the item would be a little more substantial but I was wrong. It is made from the thinnest of metal, can’t imagine it not holding up. I needed a small basket to add to my sink drain board and this looked promising. I will probably try something else a little more well built.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024

reviews.reviewText: My wire dish rack for my kitchen sink didn't have a cutlery holder. This fits and does a great job.

reviews.reviewTitle: Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly in my sink tray. Just what I wanted.

Looks good, works. The only issue is that the basket support/hanging bar is short, so it will tip sideways if you load it lopsided. So I balance the load between both sides. A longer support bar would fix this shortcoming.
Plastic rack which was part of our SS wire drying rack was broken. As a replacement, it works better than expected.
